button_recycle.componentleveltooltip: Any item from your magic items pool not currently equipped to a character can be recycled into Oathgold. The greater the rarity of the item, the larger the yield of Oathgold received for recycling it.

icon_multiple_craft.componentleveltooltip: This can be crafted/awakened multiple times.

component_text.text: Any item(s) in your magic items pool not currently equipped to a character may be recycled for a specified amount of Oathgold. The rarer the item, the more Oathgold you will receive for recycling it.
